job.title: Data Engineer - 100% Remote
job.description: pstrongJob TitlestrongnbspData EngineerppstrongPosition Typestrong Contract until December 2021 25 MonthsppstrongLocationstrong 100 remote no travel prefer Central or East Coast location since a lot of the team onshore work East Coastpp ppstrongPrimary Skillsstrong 5 years of developerdata engineer experience working specifically in Azure Python Scala SQL andor Databricks hands on experiencepp ppstrongRequirements strongpulliAt least 5 years of developerdata engineer experience working specifically in AzureliliMust have python scala SQL andor databricks hands on experienceliliShould be independent worker but collaborate with necessary peers and deliver results incrementally by taking full ownership of tasksliulpnbspppstrongDaily duties strongpp1nbspnbspnbspnbspnbspGen 1 to Gen 2 transitionppanbspnbspnbspnbspnbspMajority of their data pipelines are using Azure Data Lake Storage Gen 1 which is going to be deprecated by MicrosoftppbnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspHence they need to migrate this to ADLS Gen 2 versionppcnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspApproximately 155 data pipelines will be impacted from an ingestion pov and another 30 pipelines will also need to be updated in Refined data processppbrpp2nbspnbspnbspnbspnbspData Quality automationppanbspnbspnbspnbspnbspToday they have several notebooks and scripts that perform aggregate quality checks for multiple sourcesppbnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspSome of these need to be upgraded to use more current pipeline run information and also needs automationppcnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspThey will utilize ADLSg2 to store this metadata for reporting and analysis ppbrpp3nbspnbspnbspnbspnbspFunctions optimization and Vacuum implementationppanbspnbspnbspnbspnbspThere are Azure Functions based processes that needs update and optimization as each of them are running independentlyppbnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspOpportunity to modularize some of these functions and as a result reduce overhead on system resourcesppnbspp
